library(DBI)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)

Warning: package 'knitr' was built under R version 4.3.2

library(DT)

title: 2023_DAIE_ICA_2_LH
text:
Connection to the database

conn <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), dbname = "ICA_2023.sqlite")

title: 2023_DAIE_ICA_2_LH
text:
Part 1

Table 1

T1 <- dbGetQuery(conn, "SELECT * FROM projects;")

datatable(
  T1,
  options = list(
    pageLength = 5,
    dom = 'lBfrtip',
    lengthMenu = list(c(5, 10, 15, -1), c('5', '10', '15', 'All')),
    autoWidth = TRUE),
  rownames = FALSE) %>%
  formatStyle(
    columns = c('ProjectID', 'ProjectName', 'StartDate', 'EndDate', 'Budget', 'Status', 'CustomerID'),
    target = 'cell',
    color = 'lightblue',
    backgroundColor = 'lightgray'
  )







Table 2

T2 <- dbGetQuery(conn, "SELECT * FROM developers;")

datatable(
  T2,
  options = list(
    pageLength = 5,
    dom = 'lBfrtip',
    lengthMenu = list(c(5, 10, 15, -1), c('5', '10', '15', 'All')),
    autoWidth = TRUE),
  rownames = FALSE) %>%
  formatStyle(
    columns = c('DeveloperID', 'Name', 'Specialization', 'ExperienceYears'),
    target = 'cell',
    color = 'lightblue',
    backgroundColor = 'lightgray'
  )







Table 3

T3 <- dbGetQuery(conn, "SELECT * FROM customers;")

datatable(
  T3,
  options = list(
    pageLength = 5,
    dom = 'lBfrtip',
    lengthMenu = list(c(5, 10, 15, -1), c('5', '10', '15', 'All')),
    autoWidth = TRUE),
  rownames = FALSE) %>%
  formatStyle(
    columns = c('CustomerID', 'CustomerName', 'CustomerCity', 'CustomerCountry'),
    target = 'cell',
    color = 'lightblue',
    backgroundColor = 'lightgray'
  )







Table 4

T4 <- dbGetQuery(conn, "SELECT * FROM projectdevelopers;")

datatable(
  T4,
  options = list(
    pageLength = 5,
    dom = 'lBfrtip',
    lengthMenu = list(c(5, 10, 15, -1), c('5', '10', '15', 'All')),
    autoWidth = TRUE),
  rownames = FALSE) %>%
  formatStyle(
    columns = c('ProjectID', 'DeveloperID', 'Role'),
    target = 'cell',
    color = 'lightblue',
    backgroundColor = 'lightgray'
  )
